definition: time available

time flies like an arrow (idiom); How time flies!
lit. An interval of time is worth an ounce of gold. (idiom)/fig. free time is to be treasured

definition: An ounce of gold can't buy you an interval of time (idiom); Money can't buy you time./Time is precious.

definition: lit. An interval of time is worth an ounce of gold, money cannot buy you time. (idiom)/fig. Time is precious and must be treasured.

containing_words.word: 一寸光陰一寸金，寸金難買寸光陰

definition: lit. An interval of time is worth an ounce of gold, money cannot buy you time. (idiom)/fig. Time is precious and must be treasured.
pinyin: yi1 cun4 guang1 yin1 yi1 cun4 jin1 , cun4 jin1 nan2 mai3 cun4 guang1 yin1
containing_words.word: 一寸光陰一寸金，寸金難買寸光陰

definition: to waste time on worthless activities

sentences.english: Each moment is a gift so do not waste this gift by feeling sorry for yourself or anxious.
sentences.chinese: 每一刻都是生命的賜予，不要因焦慮而虛度光陰。

sentences.english: Time of water roll away, no plan.
sentences.chinese: 光陰之水滾滾而逝，無計挽留。

sentences.english: Application of quadrupole mass-spectrometer in the transfer system for photocathode manufacturing(PC) is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了四極質譜儀在光陰極轉移系統中的應用。

sentences.english: That formerly how to pick, time flies straight forward.
sentences.chinese: 翀那段從前怎麼去撿，光陰似箭一直向前。

sentences.english: Hell, in the past few years you’ve been all but killed about a million times.
sentences.chinese: 該死，在過去的幾年裏你除了虛度光陰以外一事無成。

sentences.english: The long time is a darkness moist sultry cavern likely.
sentences.chinese: 冗長的光陰像是一條陰晦溼潤的悶熱洞穴。

sentences.english: Years passing by quickly as if them flying.
May you lead happy life in your golden times in your life.
sentences.chinese: 希望你能在你性命中這段黃金光陰裏面過得快樂。

sentences.english: He himself could never forget the three years he had spent in the earthly presence of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 對他來說，追隨基督的那三年光陰，是他永志難忘的。

sentences.english: Time flies quicky and the time we have is quite limited.
sentences.chinese: 光陰似箭，而我們所擁有的時間又極其有限。

sentences.english: You are loafing away your precious time!
Don't try to hard. the ide's thing to dos come when you least expect them to.
sentences.chinese: 不要焦心，最好的總會在最不經意的光陰展現。

sentences.english: Idling aways one'slife is like paying gold but buying nothing.
sentences.chinese: 若把一生的光陰虛度，便是拋下黃金未買一物。

sentences.english: Time is flying, two years passed again unconsciously.
sentences.chinese: 光陰荏苒，不知不覺又過了兩年。

sentences.english: And as each invention arrives, it eats further into our time.
sentences.chinese: 而每一項新發明問世，就進一步吞噬我們的光陰。

sentences.english: The prone shadows with their outstretched arms clung to the feet of the hurrying light.
sentences.chinese: 竹影斑駁錯落，掙扎著纏繞光陰匆忙的步履。
